articles.title: ‘Fortnite’ Is Down: Here’s When Servers Come Back Online For Season 3 And Superman
articles.description: Fortnite is down for the big Season 3 update.
articles.content:
Fortnite Season 3 Credit: Epic Games

articles.title: World Brain Tumour Day 2025: Theme, Significance, Awareness And Natural Remedies for Brain Health
articles.description: Discover the significance of World Brain Tumour Day 2025, this year's theme, key risk factors, and natural herbs to support brain health. Learn about symptoms, treatments, and prevention.
articles.content: World Brain Tumour Day is observed on June 8th to raise awareness and show support for those affected by brain tumours. It was first launched in 2000 by the German Brain Tumour Association as a national initiative, later expanding into a global movem... [5244 chars]

articles.title: DICT targets to create 8M digital jobs by 2028
articles.description: The Department of Information and Communications Technology (DICT) aims to generate 8 million digital jobs in the next three years.
articles.content:
The Department of Information and Communications Technology (DICT) aims to generate 8 million digital jobs in the next three years.

articles.title: UK ministers delay AI regulation amid plans for more ‘comprehensive’ bill
articles.description: Law expected to include safety and copyright issues but delay likely to raise concerns about ongoing lack of regulation
articles.content:
Proposals to regulate artificial intelligence have been delayed by at least a year as UK ministers plan a bumper bill to regulate the technology and its use of copyrighted material.
Peter Kyle, the technology secretary, intends to introduce a “compre... [3040 chars]

articles.title: WATCH: NASA astronaut’s view of northern lights from space
articles.description: The brilliant aurora was followed by a major geomagnetic storm triggered by a solar flare emitted from the Sun last Friday.
articles.content:
The video was captured by shared by NASA astronaut, Anne McClain, who is onboard the SpaceX Dragon spacecraft, docked with the International Space Station. (Screengrab)
One of the most mesmerising sights in the night sky, the aurora borealis, or more... [649 chars]

articles.title: David Attenborough tells Prince William he nearly drowned while scuba-diving in 1950s
articles.description: Pioneering broadcaster recalls incident during discussion with royal about latest documentary, Ocean
articles.content:
Sir David Attenborough almost drowned when testing a scuba-diving helmet for his 1957 dive on the Great Barrier Reef, the broadcasting veteran has revealed in a discussion with Prince William.

articles.title: Second child dies three weeks after minibus accident on M4 slip road
articles.description: Othniel Adoma, 11, from Bracknell, died on Thursday, while five other children who were injured have been discharged from hospital
articles.content:
An 11-year-old boy has become the second child to die after a minibus overturned on a motorway slip road in Berkshire last month, police have said.
Othniel Adoma, from Bracknell, died on Thursday, more than three weeks after the single-vehicle crash.... [1093 chars]

articles.title: Mega tsunamis in Greenland reached 650 feet height, had left scientists puzzled. The mystery is now solved
articles.description: The credit of solving the puzzle goes to the Surface Water and Ocean Topography (SWOT) – a joint mission launched by NASA and French space agency in 2022.
articles.content:
Scientists have decoded an unusual incident that unfolded in September 2023, when seismic stations across the world began to pick up a steady but unusual signal, repeating every 92 seconds.
This steady pulse lasted nine full days and returned for a b... [2117 chars]

articles.title: Coco Gauff claims first French Open title after fightback floors Aryna Sabalenka
articles.description: Coco Gauff has won the French Open for the first time in her career, after defeating Aryna Sabalenka 6-7 (5), 6-2, 6-4 in an epic final at Roland Garros
articles.content: In her half-decade competing at the highest level, Coco Gauff has built an impermeable reputation for her toughness in battle. No matter the significance of the occasion or the state of her strokes, she will fight with everything at her disposal and ... [5919 chars]
